underlying_goal: Update a research presentation slide deck with new data from a catalogue file and clarify existing points.
friction_detail: Initially searched for CATALOGUE.md, but the file was actually a YAML file. The agent corrected its course quickly.
primary_success: Correctly parsed the YAML prompt catalogue and synthesized its contents into a new, well-structured slide.
brief_summary: The user asked to update week 21 slides with prompt families from a catalogue and clarify a section. The agent located the file, updated the slides with the new data and clarifications, and then added specific paper citations upon a follow-up request.
